text: what are you
doing you trapped us your father should
never have let you leave oh it's okay
it's okay The Entity it's been telling

I watched you go in all those years ago
while I was left behind
alone abandoned by you abandoned by him

this is what the entity promised me a
place where you leave pain behind and
where you leave where you leave

of Endless Possibilities Jessica you
didn't come back to your old house by

you
was that a multip poo like Alice wanted
see see Alice's imagination is
everywhere think about it all the ways
that kids play and dream come to
